entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming north 30 late this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
